reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Moving the HIV and TB responses towards 90-90-90 and sustainability with a focus on key and vulnerable populations

description.narrative: Honduras - TB/HIV - Cooperative Housing Foundation - CHF. This program has the following goals: New HIV infections among men who have sex with men account for a maximum of 30% of all new infections.. 80% of persons living with HIV, who are on ART, remain on ART.. Detect at least 85 percent of TB patients by 2020, in line with WHO estimates.. Reduce TB mortality by 25 percent in 2020 compared to 2015.. The objectives of this program are: New HIV infections among men who have sex with men account for a maximum of 30% of all new infections.. 80% of persons living with HIV, who are on ART, remain on ART.. Improve implementation of quality DOTS strategy in the patient-centered TB comprehensive care and prevention framework.. Strengthen the laboratory network to improve diagnosis and the response to the new challenges proposed in the Stop TB strategy.. Strengthen the comprehensive approach to TB/HIV co-infection.. Improve clinical and programmatic management of MDR-TB.. Develop TB prevention and control activities for vulnerable populations.

receiver-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
